textContent:
New content should not make old content obsolete. Instead it should provide more variety in playstyles, builds, etc. Award with items with interesting passives or actives, with tricks, spells, hidden virtues, etc.

Also, take into account that players experience progression differently depending on how much they have invested in their character. The first few tricks will feel impactful, the first big spell will feel impactful, but after a while, a new addition will have less impact.
title: Progression
textContentHtml:
New content should not make old content obsolete. Instead it should provide more variety in playstyles, builds, etc. Award with items with interesting passives or actives, with tricks, spells, hidden virtues, etc.


Also, take into account that players experience progression differently depending on how much they have invested in their character. The first few tricks will feel impactful, the first big spell will feel impactful, but after a while, a new addition will have less impact.
